_sText: This is a fast map with some challenging surfing. There's a pro section, and several secrets. Special thanks to ArchAngel at SolidSurf.info, who made surf_rebel_resistance_final2. A portion of the pro section was modeled after the pro section in RR. Here is a youtube video of someone surfing this map. (Although, the video is of a BETA version. This final version does not have any logos or clan names included in the map.) Note: since this is a surf map, you have to remember to go into console and type "sv_airaccelerat 600" or some high number over 100. This is what all actual "surf servers" do. Otherwise you won't be able to stay on the surf ramps. Always keep gravity at the default 800 for surf maps. Like all surf maps, it's my opinion that the best server for these maps will have DM respawn and noblock mods. Also a guns menu is nice. If not, there's a buy zone on top of spawn.
